Subject: Dark Chocolate Around The World
Description: What makes one chocolate different from others? It's not just how much cocoa or sugar it contains or how it's processed. Different varieties of are grown in different parts of the world, and sometimes it's the type of beans make for different flavor qualities. Join Cathy and Eric Raymond for a tasting session designed to show you how to tell West African chocolate from Ecuadorian.  Speakers include:Cathy Raymond, Eric Raymond - Track: Food  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
